Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.solr.handler.admin.AdminHandlers
    org.apache.solr.handler.component.DateFacetProcessor
    the whole date faceting feature is deprecated. Use range facets instead which can already work with dates.
    org.apache.solr.search.similarities.DefaultSimilarityFactory
    This class has been renamed to ClassicSimilarityFactory to reflect the renaming of the underlying Similarity returned.
    org.apache.solr.search.Insanity
    org.apache.solr.response.transform.TransformerWithContext
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.solr.util.DistanceUnits.BACKCOMPAT
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.CANONICAL_LOCALE
    Use DateFormatUtil.CANONICAL_LOCALE
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.CANONICAL_TZ
    Use DateFormatUtil.CANONICAL_TZ
    org.apache.solr.core.SolrConfig.defaultIndexConfig
    org.apache.solr.core.SolrConfig.mainIndexConfig
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.NOW
    Use DateFormatUtil.NOW
    org.apache.solr.schema.AbstractSpatialFieldType.units
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.UTC
    Use DateFormatUtil.UTC
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.Z
    Use DateFormatUtil.Z
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.formatDate(Date)
    Use DateFormatUtil.formatDate(Date)
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.formatExternal(Date)
    Use DateFormatUtil.formatExternal(Date)
    org.apache.solr.parser.CharStream.getColumn()
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner.getDispatchFilter()
    Use JettySolrRunner.getSolrDispatchFilter() or JettySolrRunner.getCoreContainer()
    org.apache.solr.core.NodeConfig.getDistributedConnectionTimeout()
    org.apache.solr.core.NodeConfig.getDistributedSocketTimeout()
    org.apache.solr.request.SimpleFacets.getFacetCounts()
    use FacetComponent.getFacetCounts(SimpleFacets) instead
    org.apache.solr.handler.component.DateFacetProcessor.getFacetDateCounts()
    Use getFacetRangeCounts which is more generalized
    org.apache.solr.handler.component.DateFacetProcessor.getFacetDateCounts(String, NamedList
    org.apache.solr.update.processor.UpdateRequestProcessorChain.getFactories()
    org.apache.solr.handler.admin.LukeRequestHandler.getIndexInfo(DirectoryReader, boolean)
    use LukeRequestHandler.getIndexInfo(DirectoryReader) since you now have to explicitly pass the "fl" prameter and this was always called with "false" anyway from CoreAdminHandler
    org.apache.solr.core.SolrResourceLoader.getInstanceDir()
    org.apache.solr.parser.CharStream.getLine()
    org.apache.solr.core.NodeConfig.getMaxUpdateConnections()
    org.apache.solr.core.NodeConfig.getMaxUpdateConnectionsPerHost()
    org.apache.solr.handler.MoreLikeThisHandler.MoreLikeThisHelper.getMoreLikeThese(DocList, int, int)
    org.apache.solr.search.SolrIndexSearcher.getOpenTime()
    org.apache.solr.core.SolrCore.getStartTime()
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.parseDate(String)
    Use DateFormatUtil.parseDate(String)
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.parseDateLenient(String, SolrQueryRequest)
    Use DateFormatUtil.parseDateLenient(String,SolrQueryRequest)
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.parseMath(Date, String)
    Use DateFormatUtil.parseMath(Date,String)
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.parseMathLenient(Date, String, SolrQueryRequest)
    Use DateFormatUtil.parseMathLenient(Date, String, SolrQueryRequest)
    org.apache.solr.handler.component.DateFacetProcessor.rangeCount(SimpleFacets.ParsedParams, SchemaField, Date, Date, boolean, boolean)
    Use rangeCount(SchemaField,String,String,boolean,boolean) which is more generalized
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner.setCoreNodeName(String)
    set properties in the Properties passed to the constructor
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner.setDataDir(String)
    set properties in the Properties passed to the constructor
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner.setShards(String)
    set properties in the Properties passed to the constructor
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner.setUlogDir(String)
    set properties in the Properties passed to the constructor
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.EmbeddedSolrServer.shutdown()
    org.apache.solr.schema.TrieDateField.toExternal(Date)
    Use DateFormatUtil.formatExternal(Date)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVParser(Reader, char)
    use CSVParser.CSVParser(Reader,CSVStrategy).
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVParser(Reader, char, char, char)
    use CSVParser.CSVParser(Reader,CSVStrategy).
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy(char, char, char, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    Use CSVStrategy.CSVStrategy(char, char, char, char, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner(String, String, int, String, String)
    use JettySolrRunner.JettySolrRunner(String,Properties,JettyConfig)
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner(String, String, int, String, String, boolean)
    use JettySolrRunner.JettySolrRunner(String,Properties,JettyConfig)
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner(String, String, int, String, String, boolean, SortedMap)
    use JettySolrRunner.JettySolrRunner(String,Properties,JettyConfig)
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner(String, String, int, String, String, boolean, SortedMap, SSLConfig)
    use JettySolrRunner.JettySolrRunner(String,Properties,JettyConfig)
    org.apache.solr.client.solrj.embedded.JettySolrRunner(String, String, int, String, String, boolean, SortedMap, SSLConfig, SortedMap, String>)
    use JettySolrRunner.JettySolrRunner(String,Properties,JettyConfig)
    org.apache.solr.core.SolrCore(String, CoreDescriptor)
    will be removed in the next release
    org.apache.solr.core.SolrCore(String, String, SolrConfig, IndexSchema, CoreDescriptor)
    will be removed in the next release
